<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get a Base64 Pix Payment Receipt"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/pix/payment/receipt/base64/{pactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This method returns a Pix Payment receipt as a Base64.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"pactualId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
